body:
Use this service to appeal a decision to refuse legal aid to a defendant on the grounds it’s in the ‘interests of justice’.

This service is the online version of the form ‘Application to appeal grant of legal aid refused on ‘interests of justice criteria’.

### Before you start

If the defendant’s (or their partner’s) financial circumstances have changed since the original legal aid application, you’ll also need to fill in and send the relevant criminal legal aid application form (CRM14, CRM15 or CRM15C). 

Read ‘Guidance for CRM14 and CRM15’ on the forms page to find out which form(s) you’ll need.
heading: Appeal a refusal of criminal legal aid
